Yes, several of these luxury hotels are located within walking distance from shopping and dining areas in Milan!

The Park Hyatt Milan is located in the high-end shopping district of Brera, which is also known for its upscale restaurants and bars. The Armani Hotel Milano is located in the fashionable Montenapoleone district, known for its luxury boutiques and high-end dining. 

The Bulgari Hotel Milan is located in the historic Brera district, which is known for its art galleries, antique shops, and trendy restaurants. The Four Seasons Hotel Milan is located near the luxury shopping street of Via Montenapoleone and the upscale dining area of Brera. 

The Mandarin Oriental Milan is located just steps away from the prestigious Via Monte Napoleone shopping district, lined with high-end fashion boutiques and luxury shops. The Carlton Hotel Baglioni is located near the famous shopping street of Via della Spiga, which is also known for its gourmet restaurants and cafes.

The Palazzo Parigi Hotel & Grand Spa is conveniently located near the trendy Brera and Garibaldi districts, which offer a variety of shopping and dining options. The Excelsior Hotel Gallia, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Milan is located in Piazza Duca d'Aosta, close to the city center and shopping areas.

So you can choose the hotel that best suits you and your preferences regarding shopping and dining.
